sentences.text: Are we expecting more people to join in as well?

I would just want to have a few details from you.
If you could help me understand what made you look out for a solution at this time and what exactly you're working on so that accordingly, I can give you a brief demonstration.

Hypersolar is the solar company that helps the customer to design and install and also take care of the solar system.

Do you have a generic email address?
